About

This digital experiment was created in the Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering, at University of Colorado Boulder for LearnChemE.com by Neil Hendren under the direction of Professor John L. Falconer and Michelle Medlin. It is based on a Mathematica simulation prepared by Neil Hendren. This digital experiment was prepared with financial support from the National Science Foundation (DUE 2336987 and 2336988) in collaboration with Washington State University. Address any questions or comments to LearnChemE@gmail.com. Our simulations are open source and available on our GitHub.
